home.exploreCollection: Explore our collection of beautiful properties across Marbella's most desirable locations
home.feedbackHelps: We'd love to hear about your experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service for future guests.
home.idRequirement: According to Spanish law, all guests are legally required to upload valid passport or ID documents to the system before the start of their stay.
home.idComplete: Please complete this process before your stay through the ID upload link provided to you via the platform where you made your reservation.

index.selectProperty: Thank you for choosing us. Please select your reservation property below.

wifi.title: WiFi Details
wifi.useCredentials: Use these credentials to connect to the WiFi network in the apartment.
wifi.tip1: Make sure WiFi is enabled on your device
wifi.tip2: Select the network name shown above
wifi.tip3: Enter the password exactly as shown
wifi.tip4: If you can't connect, try forgetting the network first
wifi.trouble: Having trouble connecting? Contact our support team for assistance.

explore.exploreBeautiful: Explore beautiful cities and historic towns around Marbella

contact.title: L&D Guest Marbella
contact.emergencyNote: In case of emergency, please don't hesitate to contact the appropriate service.

entry.title: Home Entry Instructions
entry.alohaPuebloQuestion: How do I reach the Aloha Pueblo house and how do I open the door?
entry.poolKeysInfo: The pool entrance keys are in the house where you will be staying.
entry.alohaPuebloLocation: The townhouse is located in the Aloha area, close to golf courses and Nueva Andalucía center.
entry.pleasantStayWish: We wish you a pleasant stay at Aloha Pueblo Townhouse.

parking.title: Parking Information
parking.alohaPuebloDescription: There is open street parking available nearby. The property does not have its own private parking.

1.title: Quiet Hours
1.description: Quiet hours are from 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM. Please avoid making noise during these hours.

2.title: Common Areas
2.description: When using the pool, garden, or other shared spaces, please keep them clean and tidy. Be considerate of others in the community.

1.title: Check-In and Check-Out Times
1.description:
• Check-in: After 3:00 PM
• Check-out: Before 10:00 AM

2.title: Pets
2.description: You are welcome to bring your pets, but please inform us in advance.

3.title: Smoking
3.description: Smoking is not allowed inside the house. You may smoke on the balcony or in outdoor areas.

4.title: Handle With Care
4.description: Please treat the house with care and respect. If any damage occurs or issues arise, let us know as soon as possible.

5.title: Towels and Linens
5.description: Provided towels are for indoor use only. Please bring your own towels for the beach.

6.title: Parties and Events
6.description: Hosting parties or large events is not allowed.

7.title: Check-Out Instructions
7.description:
• When leaving, ensure you return the keys to the designated location
• Double-check that you haven't left behind any personal belongings

8.title: Enjoy Your Stay
8.description: We are delighted to host you! We hope you have a relaxing and memorable vacation. If you need any assistance, feel free to contact us.

title.29051501: Explore Marbella at Your Own Pace
title.29051502: Explore Costa del Sol at Your Own Pace

description.29051501: Discover the freedom of exploring Costa del Sol with your own rental car. From scenic coastal drives to mountain adventures, make the most of your stay with a reliable vehicle from our trusted partner.
description.29051502: Discover the freedom of exploring the beautiful Costa del Sol with your own rental car. From scenic coastal drives to mountain adventures, make the most of your stay at Seaview Fontanilla with a reliable vehicle from our trusted partner.
description.29051503: Discover the freedom of exploring Costa del Sol with your own rental car. From visiting multiple golf courses to scenic coastal drives, make the most of your stay at Aloha Pueblo with a reliable vehicle from our trusted partner.
description.29051504: Discover the freedom of exploring Costa del Sol and beyond with your own rental car. From your historic Old Town location, venture out to discover beautiful coastal towns, mountain villages, and cultural treasures with a reliable vehicle from our trusted partner.

entry.title: Home Entry Instructions
entry.jardinesTropicalesWelcome:
Welcome to your Jardines Tropicales apartment! Here are the entry instructions for Calle Azahar 12.

The access codes will be sent via the platform on which you made your reservation on the day of your stay at 12:00 PM. To enter the house, first you need to take the black bar of the main door and the key card for entry from the designated location.
entry.step1Description: First, you need to get the key card and black bar from the key box. Watch the video below for instructions on how to get the key card.
entry.step2Description: After taking the black bar and the key card, use the black bar to open the main door. When you reach door A on the 1st floor, you can either tap the card or enter the code on the numbered section of the keypad system.
entry.jardinesTropicalesLocation: The apartment is located in Nueva Andalucía, close to Puerto Banús.
entry.pleasantStayWish: We wish you a pleasant stay.

parking.title: Parking Information

description.29051501: There is street parking available in front of the house where you can park your vehicle free of charge. There is no covered parking or private parking available for the property. Street parking is free.
description.29051502: Your Seaview apartment is located in Marbella center where parking can be limited. Here are the best parking options available near Calle Camilo José Cela, 7.
description.29051503: There is open street parking available nearby. The property does not have its own private parking.
description.29051504: This property does not have private parking. However, there are street parking options nearby. If you are looking for a covered parking garage, you can use the one shown in the map below:

parking.tip1: The parking area is well-lit and safe
parking.tip5: Lock your vehicle at all times
